name: Text Quest
description:
Text Quest - A Mostly Textual Dungeon Crawler by L. Rod

What is Text Quest?

It's an Adventure Game inspired by the classic Dungeon Crawlers/RPGs of the old days. It's gameplay is simple, yet fun, featuring a turn based battle system combined with a dungeon that is entirely textual, yet offers choices for you to explore and build your character along with the adventure.

** WARNING **
The game is still in development, so this demo is prone to bugs and glitches. The game will probably break and features are missing, but that doesn't mean it won't get updated or finished eventually.

Features

  • Turn Based Combat
  • Leveling and Character Progression
  • Multiple, yet unrestrictive Classes
  • Visual Character Customization
  • Dungeon Exploration
  • Arena Mode
  • Fun Gameplay
